Snapshots are point-in-time VM-level restore points.

serverServices.label: Services
serverServices.title: Operating System Updates
serverServices.description: Keep your server protected by applying regular OS updates.

updatesScheduleLabel.scheduled: You have an update schedule configured.

serverServices.updatesScheduleRunOnceWarningLabel: Once this job is complete, you will need to set up a new update schedule.
serverServices.deleteErrorMessage: Schedule could not be deleted at this time
serverServices.updateErrorMessage: Schedule could not be saved at this time

serverServicesOsUpdatesApplyNow.title: Apply Updates
serverServicesOsUpdatesApplyNow.description: Select the updates or update categories you would like to apply and we will install them on your server for you.
serverServicesOsUpdatesApplyNow.noOsUpdates: no availabe os updates for this server.
serverServicesOsUpdatesApplyNow.osUpdatesloadingContent: Loading list of server os updates.
serverServicesOsUpdatesApplyNow.errorOsUpdates: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the list of os updates for this server.

serverServicesOsUpdatesSchedule.title: Configure Schedule

description.default: Our system will update the guest OS on this server for you.
description.recurring: Our system will update the guest OS on this server for you. Your server has a recurring update schedule set. See the Recurring option below for details.
description.runonce: Our system will update the guest OS on this server for you. Your server has a one-time update schedule set. See the Later option below for details.

serverServicesOsUpdatesSchedule.noOsUpdatesCategory: no availabe os updates category for this server.

serverServicesOsUpdatesSchedule.errorGettingscheduleDate: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the os update schedule for this server.
serverServicesOsUpdatesSchedule.updateDialogMessage:
Your server already has an update schedule configured. 
 
 Are you sure you wish to overwrite this?
serverServicesOsUpdatesSchedule.deleteDialogMessage:
Deleting a schedule cannot be undone and will not revert any updates which have been applied. 
 
 Are you sure you wish to continue?

serverStorage.label: Storage
serverStorage.title: Manage Disks
serverStorage.hasEditableDiskDescription: Manage the disks attached to your server. You can delete or expand existing disks, or you can add a new disk.
serverStorage.noEditableDiskDescription: View the disks attached to your server.
serverStorage.reachedStorageLimit: You've reached the maximum number of disks for this server.
serverStorage.noDisks: No disks are attached to this server.
serverStorage.errorGettingDisks: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the list of disks.
serverStorage.fullStorageSpace: This disk cannot be created due to insufficient storage space (0 GB remaining).

vdcDropdownList.helpText: Virtual Data Center to deploy your server. You can deploy your server to any Virtual Data Center available in this list.

serverCreateDetailsStep.loading: Loading server data, this may take a few moments.

contextualHelp.serverNameField: Choose a name for your server. The server name must be 15 characters or less and can contain letters, numbers and hyphens. We'll also use this as a hostname for the server.
contextualHelp.vAppField: A vApp houses one or more servers. By default we create a vApp for each of your servers.
contextualHelp.intellicentre: Virtual Data Centre to deploy this Server in.
contextualHelp.serverTemplateField: Select the operating system or your own custom template to create this server from.
contextualHelp.computeField: Choose the memory and vCPU for your server. Click 'Enter custom size' to enter a precise value. Your selection is bound by the remaining compute in your Virtual Data Centre.
contextualHelp.storageField: Choose the profile and size of the server's primary storage volume. Click 'Enter custom size' to enter a precise value. Your selection is bound by the remaining capacity in the selected storage profile.
contextualHelp.serverName: Starting from an existing server's configuration helps you get a new server up and running quicker.
contextualHelp.networkField:
Select the network to create a primary network interface for your server.

 Select a method for acquiring the server's private IP address. Selecting DHCP will allocate an IP address on boot. Static Pool will give you the next available IP in the static pool.
contextualHelp.cloneServer: When you clone a server you get an identical copy of the existing server. it will have the same compute, storage and network characteristics. You can change the properties of server once it has been deployed.
contextualHelp.quickNavigateToCreatedServer: You can go back to server listing page to view your newly created server
contextualHelp.backToListing: This link would take you back to your server listing page

newServer.title: New server
newServer.description: Creating a new server allows you to specify the way your server will be built.

errors.invalidServerName: Server name can only contain letters, numbers or hyphens.

noResourceFound.content: No resources found. You can't create a server at this moment. Please try again later

newServer.fullStorageSpace: This server cannot be created due to insufficient storage space ({{remaining_memory}} remaining).

cloneServer.title: Clone a server
cloneServer.description: Cloning a server gives you an exact replica of an existing server in the same Virtual Data Centre.
cloneServer.noServers: No servers to clone. Create a new server first.
cloneServer.errorMessageServers: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the list of servers.

errors.invalidServerName: Server name can only contain letters, numbers or hyphens.
errors.manuallyAssignedIpWarning:
{{server_name}} has a manually-assigned IP address.
 Your new server may not be usable until {{server_name}} is stopped or its IP address is dissociated.

serverCreateAddOnsStep.description: Select the Add-Ons you'd like for this order and specify any relevant configuration options.
serverCreateAddOnsStep.antiMalwareAddOnHelp: Protect systems from malicious software, including signature-based malware detection, behaviour-based malware detection and sandboxing
serverCreateAddOnsStep.disasterRecoveryAddOnHelp: Disaster recovery has a lot of benefits including faster recovery, financial saving, scalability, and security
serverCreateAddOnsStep.sqlServerAddOnHelp: Add additional storage on your server to save more data

serverCreateProvisioningStep.description: Your server is deploying and will be available shortly. You can track progress from the notifications menu at the top of the portal.
serverCreateProvisioningStep.dataInProgress: Preparing the server deployment process. This may take a moment.
serverCreateProvisioningStep.dataError: Something went wrong while processing your request. Please try again later.

serverProvisioningPage.description: Your server is deploying and will be available shortly. You can track progress from the notifications menu at the top of the portal.
serverProvisioningPage.noJob: There are no Job to display for this server.
serverProvisioningPage.errorGettingJob: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the creation details of the server.

orderDetailsStep.description: Confirm the details of your order and then continue.

billingDetails.contractTermHelp: Select a contract term for all items in this order.
billingDetails.contractTermRequired: You must select the contract term.
billingDetails.entityHelp: Select the billing entity to bill this order to.
billingDetails.entityRequired: You must select the billing entity.
billingDetails.siteRequired: You must select the billing site.
billingDetails.costCenterHelp: Select the correct billing cost centre.
billingDetails.costCenterRequired: You must select the cost center.

orderDetails.description: Review the charges for this order below.

dialogCreateSnapshot.title: New VM Snapshot
dialogCreateSnapshot.alert: Capturing a new snapshot will replace any existing snapshots for this VM.
dialogCreateSnapshot.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to capture a new snapshot for {{server_name}}?

dialogDeleteNic.title: Delete {{nic_name}}
dialogDeleteNic.alert: This server may need to be restarted before any NIC changes are made effective.
dialogDeleteNic.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this NIC?

alert.single: Deleting a server cannot be undone. If this is the only remaining server in a vApp, the vApp will also be deleted.
alert.multiple: Deleting a server cannot be undone. If any server selected is the only remaining server in a vApp, the vApp will also be deleted.

dialogDeleteServer.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to continue?

dialogDeleteSnapshot.title: Delete {{snapshot_name}}
dialogDeleteSnapshot.alert: Deleting a snapshot cannot be undone.
dialogDeleteSnapshot.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to continue?

dialogDeleteStorage.title: Delete {{storage_name}}
dialogDeleteStorage.alert: The data on {{storage_name}} will be lost forever.
dialogDeleteStorage.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this volume?

dialogDetachMedia.title: Detach {{media_name}} Media
dialogDetachMedia.confirmation: Are you sure you want to detach this media?

dialogDiskConflictSnapshot.title: Disk Conflict
dialogDiskConflictSnapshot.alert: A snapshot cannot be captured for this server as it uses a custom, split-profile disk configuration.

dialogInsufficientStorageSnapshot.title: Insufficient Storage
dialogInsufficientStorageSnapshot.alert: The VDC {{vdc_name}} does not have enough storage space available in order to capture a snapshot.
dialogInsufficientStorageSnapshot.confirmation: Please remove any unneeded servers or snapshots and then try again.

dialogRenameServer.title: Rename Server
dialogRenameServer.information: Specify the new name for this server:

errors.invalidServerName:
Please ensure the new name meets the following criteria: 
 • Different to the current name
 • Between 1 and 15 characters
 • No special characters or spaces except - or _

dialogResetPassword.title: Reset Server Password
dialogResetPassword.poweredOnInfo: Resetting the server password requires a restart of your server. Are you sure you want to reset the password and restart server {{server_name}} now?
dialogResetPassword.poweredOffInfo: Are you sure you want to reset the password for {{server_name}}?

dialogResetPasswordFinished.title: Your Server Password
dialogResetPasswordFinished.information: We've reset the password for server {{server_name}}.
dialogResetPasswordFinished.warning: We won't show you this password again so we've emailed it to you for your reference.

dialogRestoreSnapshot.title: Restore VM Snapshot
dialogRestoreSnapshot.alert: Restoring a snapshot replaces data on the VM and cannot be undone. The server will be unavailable until this process is complete.
dialogRestoreSnapshot.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to restore {{snapshot_name}} to {{server_name}}?

alert.single: After you resume a server, you cannot return to the state that the virtual machine was in when you suspended it. To return to the same state repeatedly, you must take a snapshot.
alert.multiple: After you resume a server, you cannot return to the state that the virtual machine was in when you suspended it. To return to the same state repeatedly, you must take a snapshot.

dialogResumeServer.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to continue?

alert.single: Suspending a server will save its current state and pause any operations that are in progress.
alert.multiple: Suspending a server will save its current state and pause any operations that are in progress.

dialogSuspendServer.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to continue?

manageNetwork.inUsedEnteredIpMessage:

mediaStepDetails.mediaUrlHelp: The publicly-accessible URL for us to download your media from. For example, https://www.example.com/example.iso
mediaStepDetails.mediaDescriptionHelp: Enter a custom description for your media.

tickets.description: Below is the list of your Macquarie Cloud Services tickets.
tickets.errorMessage: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the list of tickets.

ticketCreate.description:
We all need help from time to time.

Our qualified team of Hosting Management Centre professionals are on standby 24x7 to help you get to the bottom of your issue. Provide us with as much information as you can and we'll take a look. Existing tickets can be viewed and managed in MacquarieView.
ticketCreate.creatingTicket: Creating ticket, this may take a few moments.

errors.typeRequired: You must select a ticket type.

contextualHelp.reference: If you have a reference number or ID you would like to relate to this ticket, enter it here.
contextualHelp.summary: A short title that describes this ticket.
contextualHelp.details: Please provide as much information as you can and describe any attempts made to remedy the problem
contextualHelp.services: Choose the service type this ticket relates to.
contextualHelp.attachments: Optionally attach screenshots or other files to this support ticket by dragging and dropping into this area from your computer (limit 1 file).

activity.worknotes: The comment is not visible to the customer

firewalls.description: View details of your firewalls and firewall policies. Firewalls prevent malicious traffic from accessing services deployed in your environment.

policies.description: Firewall policies specify the permissible and forbidden traffic at the network perimeter. View details of your firewall policies here.

tools.description: Macquarie Cloud Services have all the tools you need to manage your compute workloads. Occasionally you may want to do something that's not possible in the Macquarie Cloud Services portal, but available in our partner portals. You have permission to access the following partner portals.

macquarieView.name: Macquarie View
macquarieView.description: Manage company contacts, users, invoices and monitor your infrastructure.

vCloud.name: vCloud Director
vCloud.description: Manage your Virtual Machines and Virtual Data Centers.

vSphere.description: Manage every detail of your virtual data centres.

ciscoUcs.description: Unified management of all server hardware managed under one umbrella.

f5.name: F5
f5.description: Manage load balancing and SSL offload.
